方法详细信息

closeQuietly

public static void closeQuietly(java.io.Closeable closeable)
Unconditionally close a Closeable.

Equivalent to Closeable.close(), except any exceptions will be ignored. This is typically used in finally blocks.

Example code: 

 Closeable closeable = null;
 try {
        closeable = new FileReader("foo.txt");
        // process closeable
        closeable.close();
 } catch (Exception e) {
        // error handling
 } finally {
        IOUtils.closeQuietly(closeable);
 }

参数：
closeable - the object to close, may be null or already closed
从以下版本开始：
Commons IO 2.0

inputStreamToString

public static java.lang.String inputStreamToString(java.io.InputStream in)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
将输入流转换为字符串。默认采用UTF-8编码。

参数：

返回：

抛出：
java.io.IOException
